common_0100_rival_01: All right! This here is Poco Path![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_11:
It’s the path that leads to adventure for you
and me!\c
Out here, things are different than in town.
You’re gonna see wild Pokémon out and about.\r
They’ll be on the path and in the grass and such![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_12:
Get too close to one, and you’ll have to battle.
But you’ve got [VAR PKNAME(0001)] for that, right?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_13:
And if you want to try to catch a Pokémon,
you gotta use...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_02: a good ol’ [VAR COLOR(0006)]Poké Ball[VAR COLOR(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_17: I’ve got tons. Have a few![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_19:
Time for some learning by doing! Try battling
this Lechonk, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_20a:
Nice! Defeating Pokémon in battle will help
[VAR PKNAME(0001)] grow and get stronger![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_21a:
Next time, try throwing a Poké Ball when a
Pokémon’s riiight on the tip of being defeated.\r
You’ll have a decent chance at catching it then![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_20b:
Good call! If you know you can’t win a battle,
tactical retreats are what’s up![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_21b:
When you’ve got the edge, though, you can try
catching the wild Pokémon in a Poké Ball![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_20c:
Hala! That was awesome! You caught the very
first Pokémon you went for![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_21c:
I’m crummy when it comes to actually catching
Pokémon. Maybe YOU should give ME tips![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_20d:
Aw, you lost! Were you hesitating a little when it
came time to attack?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_21d:
Sometimes seeing how strong you are will make
wild Pokémon accept you. So don’t be shy—\r
battle hard and throw those Poké Balls![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_07:
Anyway, have some more Poké Balls just in case.
Not every catch works out![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_08:
Weaken the Pokémon, then throw the Poké Ball!
Remember that, and you’ll be fine![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_09:
Now go battle those wild Pokémon and catch
some of ’em![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_14:
Let’s meet back up at that lighthouse over there!
You can see our school from the top![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_10:
If your Pokémon are getting tired out, I can heal
’em for ya![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0100_rival_15:
Oh, and if you get real good at catching
Pokémon, gimme some advice! I’m not great at\r
the actual “throw the Poké Ball” part.[VAR 0114(0004)]
